com.ethercis.dao.access.interfaces

Interface I_SimpleCRUD<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    I_CompositionAccess, I_ContextAccess, I_ContributionAccess, I_EhrAccess, I_EntryAccess, I_PartyIdentifiedAccess, I_StatusAccess, I_SystemAccess
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositionAccess, ContextAccess, ContributionAccess, EhrAccess, EntryAccess, PartyIdentifiedAccess, StatusAccess, SystemAccess

    public interface I_SimpleCRUD<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
    Generic CRUD Interface
    The CRUD operation are performed on the current access layer instance
    NB: read is implemented as a static (generally as retrieveInstance(...)) Created by Christian Chevalley on 4/10/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.UUID commit()
      storeComposition a new entry in the DB, using a default transaction time
      only implemented with "root" tables: ehr, contribution and composition!
      java.util.UUID commit(java.sql.Timestamp transactionTime)
      storeComposition a new entry in the DB
      java.lang.Integer delete()
      delete the current entry.
      java.lang.Boolean update()
      updateComposition the current entry using time now as the system transaction time
      only implemented at root level object (contribution, composition, ehr).
      java.lang.Boolean update(java.lang.Boolean force)
      updateComposition the current entry using time now as the system transaction time
      only implemented at root level object (contribution, composition, ehr).
      java.lang.Boolean update(java.sql.Timestamp transactionTime)
      updateComposition the current entry
      depending on the implementation, records are updated only if one or more field(s) have been changed
      java.lang.Boolean update(java.sql.Timestamp transactionTime, boolean force)
      updateComposition the current entry even if the record is not modified
      intended to be used with temporal tables to ensure that a set of interdependent tables are updated in sync.

      • update

        java.lang.Boolean update(java.sql.Timestamp transactionTime,
                         boolean force)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        updateComposition the current entry even if the record is not modified
        intended to be used with temporal tables to ensure that a set of interdependent tables are updated in sync. This approach is used to simplify versions retrieval.
        Parameters:
        force -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
